Text: Time to take care of business—
Haaah!!!

I know we've got our hands full with the surrounding
soldiers, but are you okay with not striking down
Sergey yourself?

If you're asking whether I want to bury him myself,
the answer is yes, it's still something my heart
desires—

But, even if I can't get revenge with my own hands,
so long as it's the Shadow Garden's blade that sends
Sergey to his grave, I can live with that!
Aghh...!

If that's the kind of beatdown we're going for,
I'm pretty good myself... Take this!
Gyaaaaahhh!!!

Slime sure comes in handy, especially when it comes
to throwing my favorite weapons.

By the looks of it, wouldn't you be better off just
throwing axes from a distance?
That could be fun as well, but...

Fighting side by side with you in close combat suits
me better.
...I feel the same.

Let's advance together and clear a path! We'll let
the others focus on defeating Sergey!
Understood!
Wooshrrraahhh!!!
Agh..! What the...?!
Haaahh!
There!
Nice try!
There's an opening! Swish, swish, swiiiiish!!!
No opening...but...!
Not happening!
Whaaat?!
A-Agh...!
Ugh... Gamma...move outta the way...
Ack! I can't believe he blasted me away like that!

Despite his size, he's one agile and dexterous
bastard...!
Tsk!

And his counterattacks are precise as well. If we
carelessly attack, we'll get repelled like Gamma.
Hey! I can hear you!

Still, the fact of the matter is we haven't been able
to fully read his moves. He's clearly stronger than
No. 111, who was also a First Child.

Guess things won't go as usual! If he can read us
like that, we're better off not using magic slashes—

No need to panic, Beta, Epsilon. With our numbers
we have have the advantage.

Even if we can't find a way to prevail alone, we can
break through if we unite as a group!
Mnhh...!
If I could just suppress this lot...!
...We've defeated all your lackeys!
Surrender, Sergey!
You...!

I don't know what you intended to do, but you chose
to act without the Cult's power or help.

That was a foolish decision when up against us,
the Shadow Garden!
What skillful...swordsmanship...!
You don't stand a chance of winning now.

Is it possible to take such basic swordsmanship...
and refine it to this level of perfection?

The Shadow Garden...they are formidable foes!
Have I...underestimated my enemy...?!
Gaaahhh!!!
Ughh!

This guy... He's better at defending himself than
anyone I've fought till now!
But...as a team...we can win!

If he's tough enough that even you recognize it,
doggie, he's no match against the seven of us!
...In that case...!
What the heck...?
Everyone, be careful!
Gather beneath me... Come!!!
Wh-Wha—?!
What's with all the shaking... An earthquake?!
No... This bad smell... Something's coming!
Graaaaaarrrr...!!!
What the...?!

So many...Malaks! Don't tell me Sergey summoned them
all?!
Hear me, dragons! Devour them!
Grrraaaarghhhhhh!!!

...Oh, found it. So this is the "White Diamond"
truffle...!

(I sense some kinda battle going on over by the
cliff... This magic I'm picking up on, could it be
Alpha and the others?)

(Delta brought back that white truffle, so it makes
sense for Alpha and the others to be here gathering
them as well...)

(I mean, even bandits are showing up in this remote
region. Given the value of truffles, it's just as I
expected.)

That said, this thing is buried pretty deep
underground...
Oh? An earthquake—

(No, that's not it. It feels like vibrations caused
by a high-speed gathering of large masses
possessing a ton of magic.)

(Wait, judging by the size, could it be the dragon
Delta mentioned? And...it looks like there are more
than ten of 'em! This is getting exciting!)

(Ah, what to do? Should I keep digging for white
truffles, or should I join in on the dragon
hunting?)

(—Wait, now that I think about it, could the dragons
showing up here be those bug-eyed, stocky ones?)
...Right...

(Now is the time to prioritize the white truffles.
They're a future financial resource! With a heavy
heart, I'll have to pass on the dragon slaying!)

That's right... Today, I've swapped my slime sword
for a slime shovel. I'm the shadowy White Diamond
hunter now!
